Class SiteUtil

public class SiteUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility to handle site structures.

Version:
$Id: SiteUtil.java 473861 2006-11-12 03:51:14Z gregor $

Method Detail

getSubSite

public static NodeSet getSubSite(org.apache.avalon.framework.service.ServiceManager manager,
                                 SiteNode node)
                          throws SiteException
Returns a sub-site starting with a certain node, which includes the node itself and all nodes which require this node, in preorder.

Parameters:
manager - The service manager.
node - The top-level document.
Returns:
A document set.
Throws:
SiteException - if an error occurs.

getTransferedSubSite

public static java.util.Map getTransferedSubSite(org.apache.avalon.framework.service.ServiceManager manager,
                                                 Document source,
                                                 DocumentLocator target,
                                                 int mode)
                                          throws SiteException
Returns a document set that represents the transfer of a sub-site to another location.

Parameters:
manager - The service manager.
source - The source document.
target - The target document.
mode - The mode: MODE_REPLACE,MODE_CANCEL,MODE_CHANGE_ID.
Returns:
A map which maps source to target documents.
Throws:
SiteException - if an error occurs.

getTransferedSubSite

public static java.util.Map getTransferedSubSite(org.apache.avalon.framework.service.ServiceManager manager,
                                                 Document source,
                                                 java.lang.String targetArea,
                                                 int mode)
                                          throws SiteException
Returns a document set that represents the transfer of a sub-site to another area.

Parameters:
manager - The service manager.
source - The source document.
targetArea - The target area.
mode - The mode: MODE_REPLACE,MODE_CANCEL,MODE_CHANGE_ID.
Returns:
A map which maps sources to targets.
Throws:
SiteException - if an error occurs.
